title: Is anyone else obsessed with Taekook? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, but you should understand that this obssession will kill you. Like mentally, you will die. Most Taekookers ship it because they don’t understand what harm their obssession is doing to the community around them and for that I wrote something. I’ll try to share it here. Noor Kareem's post in ARMY Room ᴮᴱ ⁷ Sometimes, all you need to hear is a harsh scolding from someone to straighten yourself out! Srsly, there was a time when I was absolutely obssessed with a kpop ship (not gonna say which) but I was gradually able to let go of it as I matured, which I hope you will too. I’m happy that you did not aim your question in a toxic way though, so fighting! Fight yourself! This isn’t just harming everybody around you but rightnow you are your biggest enemy. Obssession with anything is fatal. ARMY, fighting!
